name: Adventures of the Poorly Drawn Man with No Torso
name_original: Adventures of the Poorly Drawn Man with No Torso
description:
It's just a weird game with weird controls that I (2nd year Game Design student) started as a midterm project and finished for the finals. 

In AOTPDMWNT, you're supposed to make a Molotov cocktail. First, you empty the beer bottle and then put it on the table on the right. Then, you pour some gasoline, vodka and salt on the bottle on the table. Then you put the piece of cloth on it, and you win.

It can be a bit hard, but I never failed. That might have something to do with the fact that I made the game, but still, it's not impossible. If you're failing, git gud.

There is an Easter egg that can be activated with the most commonly used Easter egg key combination. If you found it: Yes, that ugly mug is my ugly mug.

Right now, there is only one level, but I may or may not add another if someone actually likes this one.

Controls: 

LMB and drag: Drag the feet and the head

LMB click: Navigate the menus

Q/E: Make the left/right foot hold onto something.

W: Toggle autobalance (detailed description of this can be found in the tutorial that can be accessed through the "How to Play" button on the main menu)

ESC: Pause

Lastly, you have to launch the game in 1920x1080 resolution, because I'm dumb.
